firstname.description: The first name of the Customer

middlename.description: The middle name of the Customer

maritalStatus.description: The marital status of the Customer

birthday.description: The birth date of the Customer in YYYY-MM-DD format

birthplace.description: The birth place of the Customer

address.description: The first address line of the Customer

address2.description: The second address line of the Customer

address3.description: The third address line of the Customer

addressNumber.description: The house number of the Customer

addressNumberSuffix.description: The suffix of the house number of the Customer

poBox.description: The pobox number of the Customer

state.description: The home state of the Customer

companyName.description: The company name of the Customer

department.description: The department name of the Customer

alternateAddress.description: The first line of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateAddress2.description: The second line of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateAddress3.description: The third line of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateAddressNumber.description: The house number of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateAddressNumberSuffix.description: The suffix of the house number of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateZipCode.description: The zipcode of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateCity.description: The city of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateState.description: The state name of the secondary address of the Customer

alternateCountry.description: The the country of the secondary address of the Customer

contactMan.description: The primary contact man of the company of the Customer

jobTitle.description: The job title of the Customer

workPhone.description: The work phone number of the Customer

workExtension.description: The the extension of the work phone number of the Customer

workMobile.description: The mobile work phone number of the Customer

homePhone.description: The home phone number of the Customer

mobilePhone.description: The the mobile phone number of the Customer

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the Customer

emailAddress.description: The primary e-mail address of the Customer

alternateEmailAddress.description: The secondary e-mail address of the Customer

emailType.description: The preferred e-mail type of the Customer

smsOptIn.description: The sms opt-in status of the Customer

optIn.description: The Email opt-in status of the Customer

softBounceCount.description: The number of consecutive softbounces for this Customer

hardBounceCount.description: The number of consecutive hardbounces for this Customer

website.description: The URL of the website of the Customer

imageUrl.description: The URL to a picture of the Customer

externalId.description: A unrestricted `customer ID` field which can be filled with customer identification information

userName.description: The user name of the Customer for authentication purposes

password.description: The password of the Customer for authentication purposes

createdBy.description: The name of the Portal-user that created this record

createdAt.description: The creation date and time of this customer in `YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS` format

modifiedBy.description: The name of the Portal-user that made the last modification to the record

modifiedAt.description: The date and time of the last modification of this customer in `YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS` format
